scripts.build: npm run prefetch:prod && if [ -f .open-next-building ]; then next build; else touch .open-next-building && npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build && npm run build:routes && rm -f .open-next-building; fi
scripts.build:routes: cp .open-next/worker.js .open-next/assets/_worker.js && cp -r .open-next/cloudflare .open-next/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r .open-next/middleware .open-next/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r .open-next/server-functions .open-next/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r .open-next/.build .open-next/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo '{"version":1,"include":["/*"],"exclude":["/favicon.ico","/robots.txt","/_next/static/*","/fonts/*","/data/*","/*.png","/*.ico","/*.txt","/*.json"]}' > .open-next/assets/_routes.json
